channel.title: PKing Ideas
channel.description:
Does anybody have any ideas for free to play strength pure player killing in Runescape2? Strategies and weapon switching anything like that. I used to play a lot. I even wrote a [url=http://www.google.com/search?hl=en&q=runescape+pvp&btnG=Search]guide.[/url] but I haven't logged on recently.
An idea I had when I was chilling were making two accounts (40/60/1) called clone01 and clone02 or whatever and keep one logged off at a pking spot (castle, hillies, w/e) and then wander on medium full worlds and get into fights. If you lose you can pile-jump or you could tele if you are close to running out of food and then immediately log on with full food at the same spot. If you made 5+ clones the effect would be devastating.
Anyway, do you have any ideas? That don't suck like mine? Maybe for a new kind of pure or something...? Surprise me. I'm bored...which is obvious since I'm playing Runescape... :| :rolleyes: :o :)

item.title: PKing Ideas
item.dc:creator: @Original_Daniel Original Daniel
item.description:
@Original_Daniel wrote:

If you want some easy kills make a dds pure.

60 attack
60 or so strength
50 magic

Team up with a second dds pure, find your target and snare, then spam dds specials on them. It’s cheap but it gets plenty of kills.

Read full topic

item.title: PKing Ideas
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

[quote=“OoPko0, post:9, topic:153236”]Well my acc is a lvl 46.
ATtack 40
STr 63
def 1

I’d say the old fashion rune long and then 2h… or baxe.

NOTE: RUNE LONG OWNZ R SCIM NO REALLY LOOK AT STR BONUS DIFFERENCE

I hit 16 wit long potted then take 2h out 18 pwnt[/quote]

Ok I’ll try that and post some results later.

Read full topic

item.title: PKing Ideas
item.dc:creator: @pk4pk pk4pk
item.description:
@pk4pk wrote:

My fav stats babe 99strength 1 attack 31prayer - Obbymaul

Sup str pray pot

Full iron no kite

Obby necklace

Obby cape

Climb boots

= pwnage with 31s =]

Also hitting 17s with iron scimmiy

item.title: PKing Ideas
item.dc:creator: @billygotshot billygotshot
item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

the best pure i have ever seen was a p2p guy he had 5 attk 88 str 62 range 53 cmb… maybe 55 cmb i didnt know his hp though =\ all i know is i staked him and i got lucky as hell because he didnt hit with obby maul…

item.description:
@pk4pk wrote:

Yer fuck that shit ;). Well I’d might as get 80strength but…im not into runescape anymore…im down to mah last 200k…i dont feel like merchating to 10mil+again…i quit.

item.title: PKing Ideas
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

Yeah, seriously though, my only good character anymore is 41/78/2 with 31 pray and 67 HP. I don’t really like PKing with it anymore though, which is partly why I’m asking for ideas. And I don’t really feel like training anymore, fuck that shit.

Read full topic

item.title: PKing Ideas
item.dc:creator: @pk4pk pk4pk
item.description:
@pk4pk wrote:

Nah dude, Lol You’re level 58 hitting 22’s…it’s not a big deal because you probably dont have 99strength and level’d up like an attk def str or pray lvl…i just estimated 59…

Read full topic

item.title: PKing Ideas
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

My character, If I remember correctly, can hit 22’s at combat 59. Does that mean he sucks if combat 58 can hit 24s? I guess only if I suck at PKing. Oh well.

40 attack 99 str 1 def 31 pray is pretty ill, but it’s probably possible with members to get HP alot lower than 72 right? Pest control and quests, dunno I never tried it but it seems possible.

Read full topic
